name: The Romantic Guzzler’s Mug of Zesty Luigi
description: Pisscoin Home Collection Summer Season 2021 Catalog #03 - Overbrimming with passion. - Reinvigorate liquidity with this guzzling mug. Its eye-catching hue and romantic graphic of Pisscoin’s unofficial mascot Zesty Luigi is just what you've been searching for to liven up your guzzling decor. Buyer of this OBJKT will receive the artist’s proof of the Romantic Guzzler’s Mug of Zesty Luigi (15 oz) seen here*, signed by Pisscoin Home Collection Chief Creative Officer, Pis Pistofferson. Shipping fees are included for addresses anywhere in the continental United States. After purchase, please DM @dgpgallerie on Instagram with shipping address. Item will ship within 5-7 days of purchase. For collectors outside the continental US and for all other inquiries about the artwork, please DM @dgpgallerie on Instagram. *Only for the first sale. Resale is subject to the Guzzler’s Oath. Any collector purchasing this OBJKT through the secondary market should contact the current owner and @dgpgallerie on Instagram to confirm the good(s) for sale.
